results.title: Bernice bobs her hair
results.creator_credit: Joan Micklin Silver, Paul R. Gurian and Perspective Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The American Short Story”.
A young flapper bobs her hair to gain peer approval but she learns a lesson in values. An adaptation of the short story of the same title by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Joan Micklin Silver, Paul R. Gurian and Perspective Films
results.description:
Episode of Series “The American Short Story”.
A young flapper bobs her hair to gain peer approval but she learns a lesson in values. An adaptation of the short story of the same title by F. Scott Fitzgerald.

results.title: T is for Tumbleweed
results.creator_credit: Louis Clyde Stoumen, James A. Lebenthal and Camera Eye Pictures
results.brief_description: Portrays without commentary the racing, creeping, leaping travels of a tumbleweed and the encounters it has with people, animals and things. Photographed by Haskell Wexler.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Louis Clyde Stoumen, James A. Lebenthal and Camera Eye Pictures
results.description: Portrays without commentary the racing, creeping, leaping travels of a tumbleweed and the encounters it has with people, animals and things. Photographed by Haskell Wexler.

results.title: Another day
results.creator_credit: Anti Cancer Council, Jennie Blackwood and Zanthus Films
results.brief_description: Views of a number of people who have suffered from cancer leading normal happy lives. Stresses the importance of seeking medical advice and aid at the first suspicion that one has contracted the disease.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Anti Cancer Council, Jennie Blackwood and Zanthus Films
results.description: Views of a number of people who have suffered from cancer leading normal happy lives. Stresses the importance of seeking medical advice and aid at the first suspicion that one has contracted the disease.

results.title: To nurse is to care
results.brief_description: Impressions of hospital life and the nurse’s role, emphasises the variety and complexity of work and the versatility needed.

results.title: The Banana! very simple yet so delicious...
results.material_description: digital screen recording of Amauryguichon's tiktok post
results.brief_description: The extraordinary popularity of videos on social media that show food being prepared in short snappy close ups gives credence to the screenwriting cliche “show it don’t say it”. There’s a sensory, hypnotic satisfaction in watching someone make a simple sandwich, or in the case of Amaury Guichon, an impossibly complicated confection.
results.description:
This video features in a responsive display in the museum that presents the moments, stories and memes capturing the zeitgeist by going viral on the internet.

The extraordinary popularity of videos on social media that show food being prepared in short snappy close ups gives credence to the screenwriting cliché “show it, don’t say it”. There’s a sensory, hypnotic satisfaction in watching someone make a simple sandwich, or in the case of Amaury Guichon, an impossibly complicated confection.
description_for_label: The extraordinary popularity of videos on social media that show food being prepared in short snappy close ups gives credence to the screenwriting cliché “show it, don’t say it”. There’s a sensory, hypnotic satisfaction in watching someone make a simple sandwich, or in the case of Amaury Guichon, an impossibly complicated confection.

details.label: Curatorial section
display_values: The Story of the Moving Image → Moving Minds → MM-09. Catch of the Day

details.label: Materials
display_values: digital screen recording of Amauryguichon's tiktok post
